sentences: The Offspring is an American <<||>> band from Huntington Beach, California, <<||>> in 1984. Originally formed <<||>> Manic Subsidal, the band consists of lead vocalist and rhythm guitarist Dexter Holland, bassist Greg K., <<||>> Kevin 'Noodles' Wasserman and drummer Pete Parada. The Offspring went through several <<||>> over the years, and Holland and Greg K. have been the only constant members. The band is often credited—alongside <<||>> California punk bands Green Day and Rancid—for reviving <<||>> interest in punk rock in the 1990s. They have sold over 40 million records worldwide, being <<||>> one of the best-selling punk rock bands of all time. To date, the Offspring has released nine studio albums. Their first three albums for the independent record labels Nemesis and Epitaph <<||>> a cult following. The band's third studio album, Smash (1994), became their first <<||>>, and has sold over eleven million copies worldwide, <<||>> a record for most albums sold on an independent label and becoming the first album on Epitaph to obtain gold and platinum <<||>>. Via Wikipedia.org.
name: The Offspring
